name: Flip Flop - Reversi for Playdate
description:
The classic game of Reversi is now on PlayDate as Flip Flop!  Flip your opponent's pieces and take control of the board in this classic abstract strategy game for the PlayDate handheld game console.

  • Pass N Play mode lets you play against your friends and colleagues. Perfect for on the go competition!
  • Hone your skills against an AI opponent with two levels of difficulty
  • Enjoy a fantastic custom soundtrack composed by b.trx as you fight for control of the board
  • Need to step away from the game? Go ahead and come back later, with the game state saved from session to session.
